question: Since I left the hospital in april I have had diarrhea non stop now going on over 8 Months. It is contributed from the 13 meds that I take on Daily basis for heart probs and diabetes and I started to notice things in with the diarrhea like corn.sometimes white or yellow or greenish It finally got the best of me and I took some from the stool and when they were wet the were like smashing grease balls and when they dried they were hard as concrete, It is a complete unknown to me what they are. Has anybody had this and what is it?
title: Diarrhea and marble things
